always_on_disclosure.dialogue: Enables core functionality to power your language, location and shopping bag. Also supports security, network management, and accessibility.

metadata.description: Modal that guests see on first visit
metadata.page_sub_header:
In order to enhance your experience across our platforms and show you more relevant information, we use cookies and similar technologies, both Nike-owned and third party. You can make changes anytime by visiting ‘Privacy’ in Settings, or by visiting ‘Privacy & Cookie Settings’ at the bottom of Nike.com.

For more information, see our {privacy_policy_link_data}.

button.decline_label: Do not allow data for improved experiences

radio.decline_label: Do not allow data for improved experiences

contexts.description: Performance & Analytics permission to allow clickstream data for performance monitoring for app onboarding and web modal
contexts.consent_dialogue: Allows use of behavioral data to optimize performance, review how you interact with our sites and apps, and improve Nike experiences.

contexts.description: Personalized Experiences permission for Onboarding journey with radio buttons
contexts.consent_dialogue: Allows use of behavioral data, using cookies and other technologies, to improve your experience and provide relevant content on Nike platforms and communications.
Allows sharing of behavioral data with advertising partners. This data is used to enhance and report on the personalized advertising experience on partner sites.

learn_more.body:
We use cookies and similar technologies for advertising purposes and would like to share your browsing data with ad networks to help Nike better personalize ads outside the Nike ecosystem.

If you don't allow this, ads won't be based on your Nike browsing data and may not be as relevant to you.

You control your data. Don't like what you see? Update your preferences anytime in Settings.

For additional details please see our privacy policy.

{privacy_policy_link_data}

Changes you make to your privacy settings apply across Nike.com and all of the Nike apps you use. For more information, see our {privacy_policy_link_data}.

learn_more.title: How we use your info to personalize ads
learn_more.body:
To show offers and ads relevant to you, we would like to use your email address or phone number for profile matching with advertising platforms.

With your consent, this information is shared with our ad and social network partners to serve you personalized offers and ads. For example, in the EU, our partners include: Facebook, Instagram, Google, and Snapchat.

For more information, please see our privacy policy.

{privacy_policy_link_data}

contexts.consent_dialogue: Share your email address and phone number with Nike ad partners, so we can personalize ads based on your interests.

metadata.page_sub_header:
If you’ve made selections before, we’ve prefilled them to make it easier. Review your selections or make changes below. Any selections you make now will be applied across Nike.com and all the Nike apps you use. We use cookies and similar technologies, both Nike-owned and third party.

You can make changes anytime by visiting ‘Privacy’ in Settings, or by visiting ‘Privacy & Cookie Settings’ at the bottom of Nike.com. For more information, see our {privacy_policy_link_data}.
